alert.note: Alert for Coosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 4:26AM CDT until March 26 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN COOSA COUNTY... At 426 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hatchet, or near Kellyton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Goodwater, Kellyton, Hanover, Parkdale, Bradford, Hatchet and Crewsville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
